org.opendaylight.alto.northbound

Class AltoNorthbound

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.alto.northbound.AltoNorthbound

  • public class AltoNorthbound
extends Object
    This class provide the northbound API for ALTO in jersey.
